  • Q. Does my Apple warranty cover any software problems?

    Apple warranty does not cover software issues but for a small charge we can do this for you. turpbi dapibus ultricies ligula in lacinstibulum id fermentum nu non eleifend diam non eleifend diaam sodales justo non orci facilisis, sed lacinia erat hendreec vestibulum nisl at justo bibendum.

  • Q. How long will my repair take?

    Generally diagnostics are done within 1 day and most repairs are completed within 3 days. Some repairs can be done sooner depending on parts availability lorem ipsums sitamets dolor demonstics.

  • Q. I have sourced my own part and would like to have you fit it, is this possible?

    Yes, but you will be charged upfront for labour and we take no responsibility for the quality of the part. If for some reason the part is faulty and would like us then to unistall the part, additional charges may apply.

  • Q. How does your warranty plan work?

    We offer a 90 day warranty for all Apple products, and a 30 day warranty for Samsung phones. Our warranty covers our parts and workmanship. If the repaired or replaced parts stop working properly, bring it back and we will redo the repair at no cost to you.
